data.message: Hi. my name is Natasha. a live in Ukraine. Poltava city. I need a help. Help my please, a have 2 children. 3 years. and 1 year. My husband drinks an alcohol, and went away to other woman. I remained one with children on alease apartment.I very wantto purchase' on the apartment, I plead with you help me. My address Ukraina , Poltava city, Golovko street 6, apartment 20 .My tei 0667402198. Makarova Nataliya I will be under an obligation you life.I indeed very need Your help.Understand me please, it has nowhere us to live, I want for my little people only a 1 room apartment. Please.please help!!!
